references.reason: This book provides foundational knowledge on computational science and engineering, which is essential for understanding the context of the proposed neural operator approach.

references.paper_title: Real-time high-resolution CO2 geological storage prediction using nested Fourier neural operators
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the successful application of Fourier neural operators to a real-world problem, showcasing the potential of neural operators in scientific computing.

references.paper_title: A learning-based multiscale method and its application to inelastic impact problems
references.reason: This paper showcases a learning-based multiscale method for solving PDEs, which is relevant to the proposed CoDA-NO's ability to handle multiphysics problems.
This book provides comprehensive background on atmospheric and oceanic fluid dynamics, which is the domain of one of the multiphysics problems considered in the paper.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper explores self-supervised learning in vision transformers, which is relevant to the paper's use of self-supervised learning for pretraining the CoDA-NO model.
